info.title: Rossian's loan will start demanding NIS
The new regulations for the clinic will be in effect from 2024.
Who should replace the driving permit in a new year
25 December - Day of entry of Soviet troops into Afghanistan
The whole world congratulates Russian fighters on coming New Year (+video)
Russia is returning the oil regime
The status of a poor citizen or family from 2024 will be determined in new ways
Most Russians will meet New Year at home.
In Gosduma, there was no support for the prohibition of abortion in private clinics.
The President of Russia took stock of the year.
For the first time, a large press conference of the President will be merged with the Free Line.
The delay in the mobilization of many children ' s fathers was approved in the State Duma
In the State of Russia, it was proposed to introduce a tax on childlessness.
School phones are now prohibited: the law passed by the State.
How do we rest on a new year's holiday?
